fix(ai-chat): Enhanced error handling and console logging for debugging

- Add comprehensive console logging throughout message flow
- Add default provider selection (Cloudflare AI)
- Add detailed error messages for API responses
- Add provider select styling
- Add TypeScript type assertions for DOM elements
- Fix missing default model value
- Improve request/response debugging visibility

This commit addresses chat functionality issues by adding extensive
logging and error handling to identify where messages fail to send.

- Fixes "Expected property name or '}' in JSON" error
- Console will automatically format objects nicely
- Prevents issues with circular references or non-serializable values
